Most tags related to 'container' tags are collected here.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContainerReferrer
    Every 'ContainerReferrer' tag should have a 'container' attribute.
    FunctionContainer
    Function Container can be used around Function (-like) Tags
    FunctionContainerOrNodeProvider  
    FunctionContainerReferrer
    Function Container referrer can print function results
    NodeQueryContainer
    A NodeQuery Container can be used around node-list Tags.
    QueryContainer
    A Query container can be used around node-list Tags.
    QueryContainerReferrer
    A QueryContainerReferrer is just like a containerReferrer.

Package org.mmbase.bridge.jsp.taglib.containers Description

Most tags related to 'container' tags are collected here. This includes subtags of container tags.

An important sub-category of container tags are the tags which do provide a Query object of which the counterparts (which is contained) are the several NodeList tags). All general tags related to generating NodeLists (with Queries) are prefixed with Query.

Since:
MMBase-1.7
See Also:
ContextReferrerTag
